title: Sheppard - Church Music (4CD) [c16] (Hyperion) [MP3] [twistle]
description:
John Sheppard (1515-1558)
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Sheppard_(composer)

This torrent contains a selection of motets, two mass settings, and a set of evensong canticles.  In total, four CDs of his (mainly pre-reformation) polyphonic works.

Western Wynde was an earlier secular tune, which was then used by several composers as a theme over which the other voices of a setting were laid.  Wiki has some (dubious and debatable, in best wiki fashion!) info on it here :
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Western_wynde

MP3 VBR ~160K

___
